craftsmith.name: Craftsmith
craftsmith.description:
There is nothing like the low buzzing of your
trinkets and drones floating around the workplace.
To you, every unexpected situation is but an
opportunity to show off your newest gadgetry.

brawler.name: Brawler
brawler.description:
You find that close-quarter skirmishes and martial
arts in general suit your tastes and abilities
rather well. Anything that does not involve
breaking things is a test to your patience.

arcanist.name: Arcanist
arcanist.description:
After years of effort and study, you have
become proficient in the arcane arts passed down
since time immemorial. You strongly believe there
is nothing the power of your magic cannot achieve,
so long as you have the time to prepare.
